import React, { useState } from 'react' import PropTypes from "prop-types" import { Button, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, FormText, Container } from 'reactstrap' const NewApartment = props => { const [success, setSuccess] = useState(false) const [error, setError] = useState(false) const [form, setForm] = useState({ street_number: "", city: "", state: "", zip: "", country: "", building_manager: "", phone: "", hours: "", image_url: "", subject: "", description: "" }) const handleChange = e => { setForm({ //take all the existing form data and,... ...form, //...add new data to the end as it is typed [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() console.log(form) } return( <> Home
) } export default NewApartment
